title: Save up to 40% from the Soundcore Anker Q20i Headphones!
description: Get them with this massive discount! The post Save up to 40% from the Soundcore Anker Q20i Headphones! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Get them with this massive discount!
text: Anker’s Soundcore sub-brand has certainly grown to be a popular name when it comes to reliable (and affordable) audio gear, thanks to a good combination of specs, sound quality, and price. With that in mind, the Soundcore Q20i Headphones are currently on offer right now, bringing down their cost by as much as 40% from the usual retail price. In terms of hardware, the Soundcore Q20i Headphones come with hybrid active noise cancelling thanks to external microphones, and can even go wired thanks to an included AUX port built in. The headphones can also connect simultaneously to two different devices with Bluetooth 5.0, and can last up to 40 hours of playtime. You can check them out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
Anker’s Soundcore sub-brand has certainly grown to be a popular name when it comes to reliable (and affordable) audio gear, thanks to a good combination of specs, sound quality, and price. With that in mind, the Soundcore Q20i Headphones are currently on offer right now, bringing down their cost by as much as 40% from the usual retail price.

In terms of hardware, the Soundcore Q20i Headphones come with hybrid active noise cancelling thanks to external microphones, and can even go wired thanks to an included AUX port built in. The headphones can also connect simultaneously to two different devices with Bluetooth 5.0, and can last up to 40 hours of playtime. You can check them out using the link below.
